name: Naughty Dog, There You Are! [Gameplay Demo]
name_original: Naughty Dog, There You Are! [Gameplay Demo]
description:
That naughty dog is peeing all over your flowers! But which of all these dogs is he actually?? Rotate your view around, find out which one's the naughty, and punish him!

There are currently only 2 levels.

INSTRUCTIONS: There is one naughty dog in every level. He will pee at random intervals. You will lose when he has peed too much. Hit the spacebar to stop time when you've found the naughty dog (you cannot rotate whilst time is stopped). Click on the naughty dog to punish him and win. Punish 3 innocent dogs and you lose.

A/D - Rotate

Space - Stop time

Left Mouse Button (whilst time is stopped) - Punish dog

ESC - Return to menu

Got feedback? Comment!
